short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: quickreach finds verified prospect contact info in real time from within your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*This extension is for paid users of quickreach.io.

Find decision makers directly from the Chrome!  Our status indicator alerts you to the presence of contact information.  You can then search by job title or name to find a specific person.

You’ll see key company information including employee count, headquarter location, and description directly in the browser.  This is a huge time saver for sales teams that are segmented by size or location.

All results are stored in the main quickreach web app for later review or export.

Installation

This extension is for paid users of quickreach.io.

After you’ve installed the extension and logged in to your quickreach account, watch for the quickreach logo when visiting a company website.  The green light indicates the presence of contact info.

If you’d like to see a demo, please contact info@quickreach.io.
